subject: Basketball
NCAA Basketball Tournament
College Athletics
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: UConn came unraveled against Rutgers’s disruptive defense and lost to the Scarlet Knights, 55-47, in the final of the conference tournament Tuesday night.
snippet: UConn came unraveled against Rutgers’s disruptive defense and lost to the Scarlet Knights, 55-47, in the final of the conference tournament Tuesday night.
